name: Ultra Awesome Platform Game!
description:
Ultra Awesome Platform Game! is a very simple game made in 2 days  with the objective of improving Unity skills.

CREDITS

  • Juan Manuel Ruiz Culiáñez: Game Design and programming using Unity.
  • José Sala Lozano: Music production and composition.

  • SpritersResource
